703357f-a.title: Brooklyn Ave - south from Hawthorne to Winthrop Streets.
703357f-a.text:
Brooklyn Ave., south from Hawthorne to Winthrop Streets, in the background, showing in the center, one of the Kings County Hospital Buildings.
April 1929.
Eugene L. Argbruster Collection.
703357f-a.folder: Brooklyn Ave & south from Hawthorne to Winthrop Streets., Brooklyn, NY
